com.quantrix.dictionary.dao

Class DictionaryDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quantrix.dictionary.dao.DictionaryDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDAO<Word>

    public class DictionaryDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDAO<Word>
    Created by jasonjohns on 12/4/14. Concrete implementation of DAO interface, uses an implementation of com.quantrix.dictionary.utils.IO interface for actual file reading/writing

        public Word create(Word entity)
        Specified by:
        create in interface IDAO<Word>
        Parameters:
        entity - Word
        Returns:
        Word Creates a new Word object in the map and writes to file. If a wordName already exists, it executes an update operation.

      • update

        public Word update(Word entity)
        Specified by:
        update in interface IDAO<Word>
        Parameters:
        entity - Word
        Returns:
        Word Updates a Word definition and updateTime fields, and writes to file. If wordName does not exist, executes a create operation.
